generalErrorDescription: Please refresh your browser to continue playing or return to the lobby.
unsupportedBrowserDescription: To play this game, please use any of the supported browsers listed here.
insufficientFundsDescription: There is not enough money in your account.
soundPromptDescription: Do you want to enable sounds?
historyGameFinishedDescription: You have completed the Replay Game.
manualAutoPurchaseStopDescription: You have manually stopped auto play.
autoPurchaseCompleteDescription: You have completed all your auto play turns.
singleWinLimitDescription: You have reached your biggest single win limit.
lossLimitDescription: You have reached your maximum loss limit
